nodes.text: Detention Center B was a Galactic Empire prison and military base on the planet Kessel. After the Empire lost the Battle of Endor, it was decided to abandon Kessel and the atmosphere factories were shut down. The slaves from Detention Center B were forced to keep working in the thinning air. Shortly after, a Wookiee army led by Chewbacca, Han Solo, Lando Calrissian, and Luke Skywalker arrived on Kessel and re-powered the atmosphere factories and liberated the slaves from Detention Center A, Detention Center B, and Detention Center C.

Detention Center B first appeared in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds during the Chewbacca campaign's bonus mission. The player was tasked with re-powering the atmosphere factories, and may either destroy or ignore the military buildings in Detention Center B.
